CustomField.description: Calculated based on the Fuel Volume band and Card Product. This will enable additional discount in selected station. In case Routex is selected, this field displays N/A
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(CardProduct__c , 'Routex'), ISPICKVAL(CardProduct__c , 'CO2 Neutral Card'), ISPICKVAL(CardProduct__c , 'E-mobility Card')), 'N/A', CASE(FuelVolumeBand__c, 'V10', '1', 'V30', '1','V60','1','V100','1','V150','2','V250','2','V500','3','V750','3','V1000','4','VM','4',null))
CustomField.label: Number of Selected Stations
